name: Jack The Repair (Romain Claude)
description:
Jack repairs zombies in order to win the apocalypse. Grab body parts to fix dismembered zombies as well as you can and send them to push back a horde of angry survivors ...

Or die submerged !

Tips : 
  • You can wall jump
  • Correclty assembled zombies are more efficient
Credits: 
  • Romain Claude - Code
  • Alain Duverger - Code
  • Alexis Laugier - Music and Sound Design
  • Fog Ryû - Graphics

This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2020.
